title: (x) front.com titling face - Section {Dav}
content:
Hi there. I'm to identify this font:   
   
 [http://flash.designbyfront.com/flash.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516054603/http:/flash.designbyfront.com/flash.htm)   
   
Once at the site, enter for example "our work". It's the font used in "Dennison Commercials". It looks a bit like microstyle but it isn't. Any help will be very much appreciated. ThanX very much.
author: willywonka
